sub_title: Make data speak for your brand | MSc Behavioural Economics | ESE, Bocconi, LMU | BSc Psy & BSc BA
summary:
Make data speak for your brand!

I'm Florian, Co-Founder of LOF Branding. We are here to boost your brand with the help of behavioural science.

Working in different positions in consulting, marketing and advertising the need for the use of data to tailor a brand became quite pronounced. In this course, I'm here, happy to help small- and medium-sized businesses reach the awareness they deserve for their business simply by understanding what the potential target audience's true desires are - data-backed.

awards.title: Award for the Best Project Presentation of the Empirical-experimental Internship
awards.description: The study on Narcissism and its achievement motives won the first price in the presentation round of the empirical-experimental internships at university.

awards.title: Batch Summer Term 2018 at the LMU Entrepreneurship Center
awards.description:
The LMU Entrepreneurship Center is an accelerator and dedicated to empowering early stage startups.
stencom took part in the selective application process and successfully participated in the six months program, thereby we were coached by highly qualified experts, entrepreneurs and investors.

profile_positions.description:
− Founded data-driven branding agency developing SaaS solution
− Leading a team of up to 5 co-workers
− Managing projects for clients such as VDL, U-Boat Worx, EPAplus, VANN, etc.

− Part of the ACE (Amsterdam Center for Entrepreneurship) incubator program to determine establishing a SaaS business //work-in-progress

− Carrying out marketing analyses, target group trend analyses, brand workshops, photography, videography
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Worked on various projects, e.g.:
− Program management for the implementation of fibre and wifi in Berlin's general education schools (approx. 830 schools), responsible for stakeholder communication
− Strategy for the realization of new communication technology in the public transport sector
− Audit of CRM management of an innovation accelerator
profile_positions.title: Associate Tech Consulting

profile_positions.description:
− Examined the behavioural intention to use future MaaS (shared autonomous vehicles and dynamic ride-pooling services)
− Conducted a study in the German market, analysed data and gave recommendations for policy and industry
− Master Thesis in cooperation with the Public Sector Advisory team
profile_positions.title: Master Thesis Project

profile_positions.description:

volunteer_experiences.description: Mentoring students of Erasmus University Rotterdam to help them make the transition from university into entrepreneurship and employment within the MentorMe programme.

volunteer_experiences.role: Consultant for urban planning & childhood development
volunteer_experiences.description: Conducting field research for the Bernard van Leer Foundation in order to examine the effects of nature in an urban setting on children well-being/childhood development within the framework of the Urban95 project
During the Covid-19 pandemic, I went through various departments of general psychiatry and supported psychological care.

volunteer_experiences.role: Pro bono Businessplan Consultant for a Prisoner
volunteer_experiences.description: The Leonhard gGmbH has the aim to reintegrate prisoners into society. Therefore, an entrepreneurship programme is provided to the prisoners. During this programme a business plan is prepared. The business plan consultants provide market information and feedback for the business ideas.
